name: YouTube Studio Dark Mode
description: Dark Mode for YouTube Studio (Creator Control Panel / My Videos) because although the main site has it as default now, there is no option for their blindingly white control panel. It affects the Edit Video page and every other page under the YouTube Studio / My Video page.

discussions.name: So you just took "Night Mode" theme for all websites and renamed it to YT Studio Dark
